text: Booco is an archaeological site in the northeastern Bari province of Somalia. ==Overview== Booco is situated in the Aluula District, near Aluula. The site features a number of ancient structures. Two of these are enclosed platform monuments set together, which are surrounded by small stone circles. The circles of stone are believed to mark associated graves. ==See also== *Damo *Mosylon *Somali aristocratic and court titles ==Notes== ==References== *Booco, Somalia Category:Archaeological sites in Somalia Category:Ancient Somalia Category:Bari, Somalia
title: Booco
